text: Duke Street Church is a conservative evangelical church in Duke Street, Richmond, south west London. It is a member of the South East Gospel Partnership. The church was formally established in 1870. The present church building, which was opened by Sir Cyril Black, dates from 1962 and replaced an 1881 church building. Duke Street Church is a congregational member of the World Reformed Fellowship. ==References== == External links == * Official website *South East Gospel Partnership *Interview with Liam Goligher Category:1870 establishments in England Category:20th-century churches in the United Kingdom Category:Baptist churches in the London Borough of Richmond upon Thames Category:Richmond, London Category:Churches completed in 1962 Category:Baptist congregations established in the 19th century
title: Duke Street Church, Richmond
